ReferenceState - Enum in resourcemanager
Enumerated states for referenced nodes
remove(String) - Method in class resourcemanager.ResourceLookupTable
Deactivates a resource from the graph without fully deleting it.
resetReferencedStates() - Method in class resourcemanager.ResourceGraph
Sets reference states for each node to unchecked.
resetReferencedStates() - Method in class resourcemanager.ResourceLookupTable
Sets all referenced states in the table back to "unchecked".
resetUsableStates() - Method in class resourcemanager.ResourceGraph
Sets usability states for each node to unchecked.
resetUsableStates() - Method in class resourcemanager.ResourceLookupTable
Sets all usable states in the table back to "unchecked".
